responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: What needs to be done at first day?
responses: i> Complete the digital signature on the form which you would have received from 'DocuSign System'.ii> Complete all the UST Mandate training's including induction.iii > Talk to your respective manager for Intel WWID, network, credentials and laptop.

patterns: what is the Intel training URL?
responses: Training URL or website in Intel- Goto intel training https://intel.sabacloud.com/

patterns: what is the Intel training URL?
responses: Goto intel training site- 1> New Contractor Orientation NCO(10012075),2> Hazcom Basics GHS(10008984),Lab Safety(0000158)3> PreProduction Hardware Management Overview(20015147),4> BASIC ELECTRICAL SAFETY(00019189)

patterns: Please provide the intel quick links
responses: 1> Inventory (ISMP)- https://e2esm.intel.com/navpage.do,2> Cosmos9/Jama - https://cosmos9.intel.com/login.req, 3> IT support - http://it.intel.com/

patterns: Please give me the emergency contact details for intel
what are the emergency contact details ?
responses: 1> TAC-1234,2> Security Emergency-5858,3> Lobby Security SRR1 / SRR2-5252 / 6262 4> Corporate Services-5678,5> Gate Security-3105 / 3106

responses: 1> Optimus (Timesheet)-https://ust.digite.com/digite,2> Web Email-https://outlook.office365.com, 3> Kubera - https://ustglobal.sharepoint.com/Home/SitePages/Home.aspx, 4> Talent Management - https://edvz.fs.ap1.oraclecloud.com/homePage/faces/FuseWelcome
